attributes.action: End free traveling for kids on buses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to petition the end of free traveling for kids on londons buses. I can understand if the child is from a low income family, that is a completely different matter. The state should not pay for such service as it puts a burden on the travel service as well as pushing up the price of travel for the everyday user!!
